info.title: iStore Adapter API
info.description: SPI middleware component: acts as an adapter to the iStore databases.

get.description: Returns a single census, based on its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the learning provider to return.

parameters.name: X-Internal-Request-Id
parameters.description: An internal request id. Should be a vaild guid.

parameters.name: X-External-Request-Id
parameters.description: An optional external request id. Used in logging.

200.description: The learning provider exists, and is part of the body of the response.

404.description: No learning provider exists for the given id.

post.description: Returns a single census, based on its id.

parameters.name: X-External-Request-Id

200.description: The learning provider exists, and is part of the body of the response.

404.description: No learning provider exists for the given id.
